tasks.title: Project Meeting
tasks.description: Discuss project milestones and deliverables with the team.

tasks.title: Code Review
tasks.description: Review the latest code changes and provide feedback.

tasks.title: Client Presentation
tasks.description: Present the project progress to the client.

tasks.title: Team Lunch
tasks.description: Team bonding lunch at a local restaurant.

tasks.title: Market Research
tasks.description: Conduct research on market trends and competitors.

tasks.title: Development Sprint Planning
tasks.description: Plan the tasks and goals for the next development sprint.

tasks.title: Design Review
tasks.description: Review the latest UI/UX designs and suggest improvements.

tasks.title: Budget Meeting
tasks.description: Discuss the project budget and financial planning.

tasks.title: QA Testing
tasks.description: Perform quality assurance testing on the latest build.

tasks.title: Weekly Wrap-up
tasks.description: Summarize the week's progress and plan for the next week.
